name: Spooky Game (STIVVVV)
description:
Enter a labyrinth that twists and changes , Can you escape the hidden monster by finding the invisible keys.

Controls:

wasd: To move

Left Shift: to run

Left click : to interact

Esc and P : to pause

A special thank you to everyone that has helped me along the way regardless of how large or small it was,  I hope you enjoy my game.
